short_summary: Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).
description: Temporary Help Services Requirement for the Department of National Defense.
full_summary:
================

**Title:**
Technologist - Architectural Temporary Help Services
*Solicitation Number:* S5024691
*Publication Date:* July 19, 2024
*Tender Closing Date:* August 2, 2024, 15:00 (Eastern Time)

**Notice Type:**
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement (SA) for Temporary Help Services.

**Description:**
The Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services, specifically for a Technologist in Architecture. The services will be provided against Supply Arrangement EN578-172870 for the National Capital Region.

**Security Level:**
The required resources must have a minimum security level of Secret.

**Expected Contract Start/End Date:**
The start and end dates will be determined based on mutually agreed-upon terms.

**Regions of Opportunity/Delivery:**
The Region of the National Capital (NCR) is the primary location for this requirement.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

**Selection Criteria:**
The selection will be based on variations or combinations of the confidential selection methods to be used.

**Tender Documents:**
The tender documents, including the RFP, can be found on the Canada BUsys website.

**Qualifications:**
Only those suppliers who have qualified under the relevant streams and categories of the Supply Arrangement will be eligible to submit a proposal.

**Proposed Vendors:**
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

*   3056058 Canada inc.
*   Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
*   AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
*   CSI Consulting Inc.
*   DLS Technology Corporation
*   Messa Computing Inc.
*   OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
*   Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
*   Prologic Systems Ltd.
*   Randstad Interim Inc.
*   TRM Technologies Inc.

**Contact Information:**
For any queries or concerns, please contact the contract specialist at CFSG(O-G) Temp Help, Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca). They can assist in addressing inquiries and facilitating the procurement process.
